1_1JxycrsLzVrPA247VxtPuwfdQBA6BJrSQ3.body:
Good to hear your thoughts Max...I hope this new and improved tech tool(Zeronet) will be a contributor to a more just and caring world...I reserve the rights as always(I can sometimes be longwinded) to add more later as the thoughts occur to me and I get to know the ins and out of this platform better...more people add, improve, diversify,
and we all have our needs met.

1_154jAWx5PDRmvF4txGHo4Edw1BpduhDyvw.body: Kinda goes against the p2p decentralized idea putting zeronet back onto servers in the cloud out there...I like the idea of being able to get a full update let's say on my laptop and then being able to go somewhere(my choice) and peruse the content any way I want.  Please feel free to respond and update/help me further these incomplete semi- formed ideas some other persuasion might formalize differently.

2_1Hcc6FX8CaRnXcGC4EYZ4NjrR2yfxuUHW8.body: Retarded possibly is a shared state of mind with this new and fun p2p platform.  I checked out Play when I first got on here a couple of days ago and when using the Maelstrom browser  which is known to have built in torrent capability depending on which magnet link I click on like SD only gives me a magnet link while the 720 link finds the swarm/seeds for that torrent then starts to download and stream/starts the video directly in the browser so I can watch it.  I have yet to click on the full blue-ray density file as my internet bandwidth won't support it.  I will eventually try another browser to see what it does but hey other places in Zeronet right now have my attention.

3_1HcK5Hw1rPZeYdgTmqJGrVG2tSyR9Ke2Gt.body: What's with the brevity on the comments?  With more than just a few words can someone explain why not to click on the link...WTF! I don't care if the joke's on me...One of the reasons I am on Zeronet is cause I am tired of living in a  bubble caused, created, and perpetrated by the mass media and some ass clown isps...
